id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-educational-learning new job skills with accessible instruction
title: Learning new job skills with accessible instruction
description: Learning new job skills with accessible instruction
content:
Scenario: Learning new job skills with accessible instruction
    Given Jordan wants to learn library cataloging skills
    And the library offers training for this task
    When Jordan participates in the training
    Then instruction is provided in cognitively accessible format
    And the trainer uses simple language, visual aids, and step-by-step guidance
    And Jordan can practice skills with patient repetition
    And mistakes are treated as learning opportunities, not failures
    And Jordan's progress is celebrated at each milestone
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for skill development contribution
    And Jordan experiences growth and increasing capability
